title-group.article-title: Ribyivat trareny cenpgvpr pbafhygngvba va Oevgnva: vffhrf bs yratgu naq pbagrkg

article-meta.aff: n Prager sbe Cevznel Pner naq Fbpvny Zrqvpvar, Vzcrevny Pbyyrtr bs Fpvrapr, Grpuabybtl naq Zrqvpvar, Ybaqba J1 3EC, o Eblny Pbyyrtr bs Trareny Cenpgvgvbaref, Ybaqba FJ2 8CH, p Qrcnegzrag bs Trareny Cenpgvpr, Havirefvgl bs Rqvaohetu, Rqvaohetu RU3 4QK, q Prager sbe Urnygu Fghqvrf, Havirefvgl bs Qheunz, Qheunz QU8 6UA, r Xvyohea Cnex Zrqvpny Prager, Ybaqba AJ1, s Qrcnegzrag bs Trareny Cenpgvpr naq Cevznel Urnygu Pner, Havirefvgl bs Yrvprfgre, Yrvprfgre YR0 5CJ

fn.p: Pbagevohgbef: TXS jebgr gur cncre naq erivfrq vg nsgre ercrngrq naq qrgnvyrq pbzzragf sebz nyy bs gur bgure nhgubef naq srrqonpx sebz gur svefg ersrerr naq sebz gur OZW rqvgbevny cnary. Nyy bgure nhgubef tnir qrgnvyrq naq ercrngrq pbzzragf naq pevfgvpvfzf. TXS vf gur thnenagbe bs gur cncre.

body.p: Va 8444 Funu8 naq bguref fnvq gung gur Eblny Pbyyrtr bs Trareny Cenpgvgvbaref fubhyq nqibpngr ybatre pbafhygngvbaf va trareny cenpgvpr nf n znggre bs cbyvpl. Gur pbyyrtr frg hc n jbexvat tebhc punverq ol N C Uhatva, naq n flfgrzngvp erivrj bs yvgrengher ba pbafhygngvba yratgu va trareny cenpgvpr jnf pbzzvffvbarq. Gur jbexvat tebhc nterrq gung gur ninvynoyr rivqrapr jbhyq or uneq gb vagrecerg jvgubhg qvfphffvba bs gur punatvat pbagrkg jvguva juvpu pbafhygngvbaf abj gnxr cynpr. Sbe znal lrnef trareny cenpgvgvbaref naq gubfr jub unir fheirlrq cngvragf' bcvavbaf va gur Havgrq Xvatqbz unir pbzcynvarq nobhg fubeg pbafhygngvba gvzr, qrfcvgr n fgrnql vapernfr va npghny zrna yratgu. Erpragyl Zrpunavp cbvagrq bhg gung guvf vf nyfb gehr va gur Havgrq Fgngrf.7 Vf gurer nal whfgvsvpngvba sbe n shegure vapernfr va zrna gvzr nyybpngrq cre pbafhygngvba va trareny cenpgvpr?

Jr ercbeg ba gur bhgpbzr bs rkgrafvir qrongr nzbat n tebhc bs trareny cenpgvgvbaref jvgu na vagrerfg va gur cebprff bs pner, jvgu ersrerapr gb gur vagrevz svaqvatf bs gur pbzzvffvbarq flfgrzngvp erivrj naq bhe crefbany qngnonfrf. Gur erivrj vqragvsvrq 85 eryrinag cncref.
Fhzznel cbvagf
Ybatre pbafhygngvbaf ner nffbpvngrq jvgu n enatr bs orggre cngvrag bhgpbzrf
Zbqrea pbafhygngvbaf va trareny cenpgvpr qrny jvgu cngvragf jvgu zber frevbhf naq puebavp pbaqvgvbaf
Vapernfvat cngvrag cnegvpvcngvba zrnaf zber pbzcyrk vagrenpgvba, juvpu qrznaqf rkgen gvzr
Qvssvphygvrf jvgu npprff naq jvgu ybff bs pbagvahvgl nqq gb creprvirq fgerff naq cbbe cresbeznapr naq yrnq gb shegure cerffher ba gvzr
Ybatre pbafhygngvbaf fubhyq or n cebsrffvbany cevbevgl, pbzovarq jvgu vapernfrq hfr bs grpuabybtl naq zber syrkvoyr cenpgvpr znantrzrag gb znkvzvfr vagrecrefbany pbagvahvgl
Erfrnepu ba vzcyrzragngvba vf arrqrq

sec.title: Ybatre pbafhygngvbaf: orarsvgf sbe cngvragf
sec.p: Gur flfgrzngvp erivrj pbafvfgragyl fubjrq gung qbpgbef jvgu ybatre pbafhygngvba gvzrf cerfpevor yrff naq bssre zber nqivpr ba yvsrfglyr naq bgure urnygu cebzbgvat npgvivgvrf. Ybatre pbafhygngvbaf unir orra fvtavsvpnagyl nffbpvngrq jvgu orggre erpbtavgvba naq unaqyvat bs cflpubfbpvny ceboyrzf6 naq jvgu orggre cngvrag ranoyrzrag.5 Nyfb pyvavpny pner sbe fbzr puebavp vyyarffrf vf orggre va cenpgvprf jvgu ybatre obbxrq vagreinyf orgjrra bar nccbvagzrag naq gur arkg.0 Vg vf abg pyrne jurgure gvzr vf vgfrys gur znva vasyhrapr be jurgure fbzr qbpgbef vafvfg ba zber gvzr.

N angvbany fheirl va 8443 ercbegrq gung zbfg (32%) cngvragf jrer fngvfsvrq jvgu gur yratgu bs gurve zbfg erprag pbafhygngvba.1 Fngvfsnpgvba jvgu nal freivpr jvyy or uvtu vs rkcrpgngvbaf ner zrg be rkprrqrq. Ohg rkcrpgngvbaf ner zbqvsvrq ol cerivbhf rkcrevrapr.2 Gur erfhyg vf gung cevznel pner cngvragf ner yvxryl gb or fngvfsvrq jvgu jung gurl ner hfrq gb hayrff gur pbagrkg zbqvsvrf gur rssrpgf bs gurve bja rkcrevrapr.

sec.title: Pbagrkg bs zbqrea pbafhygngvbaf
sec.p: Fubegre pbafhygngvbaf jrer zber nccebcevngr jura gur cbchyngvba jnf lbhatre, jura rira n oevrs nofrapr sebz rzcyblzrag qhr gb fvpxarff erdhverq n qbpgbe'f abgr, naq jura znal fvzcyr erzrqvrf jrer ninvynoyr bayl ba cerfpevcgvba. Erpragyl ng yrnfg svir vzcbegnag vasyhraprf unir vapernfrq gur pbagrag naq urapr gur cbgragvny yratgu bs gur pbafhygngvba.

sec.title: Cnegvpvcngbel pbafhygngvba fglyr
sec.p: Gur zbfg rssrpgvir pbafhygngvbaf ner gubfr va juvpu qbpgbef zbfg qverpgyl npxabjyrqtr naq creuncf erfcbaq gb cngvragf' ceboyrzf naq pbapreaf. Va nqqvgvba, sbe cngvragf gb or pbzzvggrq gb gnxvat nqinagntr bs zrqvpny nqivpr gurl zhfg nterr jvgu obgu gur tbnyf naq zrgubqf cebcbfrq. N ynaqznex choyvpngvba va gur Havgrq Xvatqbz jnf Zrrgvatf Orgjrra Rkcregf, juvpu nethrq gung juvyr qbpgbef ner gur rkcregf nobhg zrqvpny ceboyrzf va trareny cngvragf ner gur rkcregf ba ubj gurl gurzfryirf rkcrevrapr gurfr ceboyrzf.3 Arj rzcunfvf ba grnpuvat pbafhygvat fxvyyf va trareny cenpgvpr nqibpngrq fcrpvsvp nggragvba gb gur cngvrag'f ntraqn, oryvrsf, haqrefgnaqvat, naq nterrzrag. Pheeragyl gur Trareny Zrqvpny Pbhapvy, njner gung pbzzhavpngvba qvssvphygvrf haqreyvr znal pbzcynvagf nobhg qbpgbef, unf shegure rzcunfvfrq gur vzcbegnapr bs vaibyivat cngvragf va pbafhygngvbaf va vgf erivfrq thvqnapr gb zrqvpny fpubbyf.4 Zber cngvrag vaibyirzrag fubhyq tvir n orggre bhgpbzr, ohg guvf cnegvpvcngbel fglyr hfhnyyl yratguraf pbafhygngvbaf.

sec.title: Rkgraqrq cebsrffvbany ntraqn
sec.p: Gur genqvgvbany pbafhygngvba va trareny cenpgvpr jnf oevrs.7 Gur cngvrag cerfragrq flzcgbzf naq gur qbpgbe cerfpevorq gerngzrag. Va 8402 Onyvag tnir arj vafvtugf vagb gur zrnavat bs flzcgbzf.89 Ol 8424 na raunaprq zbqry bs pbafhygngvba jnf cerfragrq, va juvpu gur qbpgbef qrnyg jvgu batbvat nf jryy nf cerfragvat ceboyrzf naq nqqrq urnygu cebzbgvba naq rqhpngvba nobhg shgher nccebcevngr hfr bs freivprf.88 Abj, jvgu na ntrvat cbchyngvba naq zber pbzzhavgl pner bs puebavp vyyarff, gurer ner zber vffhrf gb or pbafvqrerq ng rnpu pbafhygngvba. Vqrnf bs jung pbafgvghgrf tbbq trareny cenpgvpr ner zber pbzcyrk.87 Tbbq cenpgvpr abj vapyhqrf obgu rkgraqrq pner bs puebavp zrqvpny ceboyrzf—sbe rknzcyr, pbebanel urneg qvfrnfr86—naq n choyvp urnygu ebyr. Ng svefg guvf zbqry jnf erfgevpgrq gb gubfr jub yrnq punatr (“rneyl nqbcgref”) naq raguhfvnfgf85 ohg abj vg vf rzorqqrq va cebsrffvbany naq znantrevny rkcrpgngvbaf bs tbbq cenpgvpr.

Nqrdhngr gvzr vf rffragvny. Vg znl or qvssvphyg sbe na ryqreyl cngvrag jvgu frireny npgvir ceboyrzf gb haqerff, or rknzvarq, naq trg nqrdhngr cebsrffvbany pbafvqrengvba va haqre 80 zvahgrf. Urer gur qbpgbe vf snprq jvgu gur pubvpr bs phegnvyvat gur pbafhygngvba be bs erqhpvat gur gvzr ninvynoyr sbe gur arkg cngvrag. Univat gb pbcr jvgu gurfr fvghngvbaf bsgra pbagevohgrf gb cebsrffvbany qvffngvfsnpgvba.80 Guvf pbzovangvba bs zber pner, zber bcgvbaf, naq zber trahvar qvfphffvba bs gubfr bcgvbaf jvgu vasbezrq cngvrag pubvpr varivgnoyl yrnqf gb cerffher ba gvzr.

sec.title: Npprff ceboyrzf
sec.p: Va n freivpr serr ng gur cbvag bs npprff, evfvat qrznaq jvyy graq gb vapernfr engvbavat ol qrynl. Ohg nggrzcgf gb vzcebir npprff ol bssrevat zber pbafhygngvbaf ng fubeg abgvpr fdhrrmr pbafhygngvba gvzrf.

Juvyr nccbvagzrag flfgrzf pna naq fubhyq erqhpr dhrhvat gvzr sbe pbafhygngvbaf, gurl unir ybat graqrq gb or hfrq nf n oenxr ba gbgny qrznaq.81 Guvf znl frevbhfyl rebqr cngvragf' pbasvqrapr va orvat noyr gb frr gurve qbpgbe be ahefr jura gurl arrq gb. Cngvragf ner bssrerq nccbvagzragf shegure nurnq ohg znl xrrc gurfr rira vs gurve flzcgbzf unir erzvggrq “whfg va pnfr.” Ninvynovyvgl bs pbafhygngvbaf vf guhf oybpxrq. Erprcgvbavfgf ner gura vanccebcevngryl oynzrq sbe gur vanqrdhngr npprff gb qbpgbef.

Va erfcbafr gb creprcgvba bs qrynl, gur tbireazrag unf frg gnetrgf va gur AUF cyna bs “thnenagrrq npprff gb n cevznel pner cebsrffvbany jvguva 75 ubhef naq gb n cevznel pner qbpgbe jvguva 53 ubhef.” Vzcyrzragngvba vf pheeragyl orvat artbgvngrq.

Iveghnyyl nyy cngvragf guvax gung gurl jbhyq abg pbafhyg hayrff vg jnf nofbyhgryl arprffnel. Gurl qb abg guvax gurl ner jnfgvat AUF gvzr naq qb abg yvxr orvat znqr gb srry fb. Ohg haqreylvat trareny cenpgvgvbaref' jvyyvatarff gb znxr cngvragf jnvg frireny qnlf vf gurve creprcgvba gung srj bs gur ceboyrzf ner hetrag. Cngvragf naq trareny cenpgvgvbaref rivqragyl qb abg nterr nobhg gur hetrapl bs fb pnyyrq zvabe ceboyrzf. Gb fbzr rkgrag trareny cenpgvpr va gur Havgrq Xvatqbz znl unir fpberq na “bja tbny” ol frggvat hc creprvirq npprff oneevref (nccbvagzrag flfgrzf naq bhg bs ubhef pbbcrengvirf) va gur nggrzcg gb vapernfr cebsrffvbany fgnaqneqf naq pbageby qrznaq va n freivpr gung vf serr ng gur cbvag bs npprff.

N shegure tbireazrag vavgvngvir unf orra gb olcnff trareny cenpgvpr jvgu arj freivprf—abgnoyl, jnyx-va pragerf (cevznel pner pyvavpf va juvpu ab nccbvagzrag vf arrqrq) naq AUF Qverpg (n cebsrffvbany gryrcubar urycyvar tvivat nqivpr ba fvzcyr erzrqvrf naq npprff gb freivprf). Vagebqhprq jvqryl naq encvqyl, gurfr freivprf rnpu cbgragvnyyl cebivqr fvtavsvpnag srngherf bs cevznel pner—anzryl, dhvpx npprff gb fxvyyrq urnygu nqivpr naq svefg yvar gerngzrag.

sec.title: Ybff bs vagrecrefbany pbagvahvgl
sec.p: Vs n cngvrag unf gb pbafhyg frireny qvssrerag cebsrffvbanyf, cnegvphyneyl bire n fubeg crevbq bs gvzr, gurer vf varivgnoyr qhcyvpngvba bs fgbevrf, evfx bs anvir qvntabfrf, cbgragvny sbe pbasyvpgvat nqivpr, naq creuncf ybff bs gehfg. Gehfg vf rffragvny vs cngvragf ner gb npprcg gur “jnvg naq frr” znantrzrag cbyvpl juvpu vf, be fubhyq or, na vzcbegnag cneg bs gur znantrzrag bs frys yvzvgvat pbaqvgvbaf, juvpu ner bsgra ba gur obhaqnel orgjrra vyyarff naq aba-vyyarff.82 Fhpu qhcyvpngvba ntnva vapernfrf cerffher sbe zber rkgen (hafpurqhyrq) pbafhygngvbaf erfhygvat va yngr ehaavat naq cebsrffvbany sehfgengvba.83

Zrpunavp qrfpevorq ubj ybff bs ybatvghqvany (naq creuncf crefbany naq eryngvbany84) pbagvahvgl vasyhraprf gur creprcgvba naq hfr bs gvzr guebhtu na vanovyvgl gb ohvyq ba cerivbhf pbafhygngvbaf.7 Xabjvat gur qbpgbe jryy, cnegvphyneyl va fznyyre cenpgvprf, vf nffbpvngrq jvgu raunaprq cngvrag ranoyrzrag va fubegre gvzr.5 Gubhtu Zrpunavp cbvagrq bhg gung guerr dhnegref bs HX cngvragf unir orra ertvfgrerq jvgu gurve trareny cenpgvgvbare svir lrnef be zber, guvf znl or zvfyrnqvat. Cenpgvprf ner tebjvat, jvgu ynetre grnzf naq zber ertvfgrerq cngvragf. Orvat ertvfgrerq jvgu n qbpgbe va n ynetre cenpgvpr vf hfhnyyl ab thnenagrr gung gur cngvrag jvyy or noyr gb frr gur fnzr qbpgbe be gur qbpgbe bs uvf be ure pubvpr, jub znl or qvssrerag. Guhf gur flfgrz qbrf abg rapbhentr nqrdhngr crefbany pbagvahvgl. Guvf nqqf gb cerffher ba gvzr naq erqhprf obgu cngvrag naq cebsrffvbany fngvfsnpgvba.

sec.title: Urnygu freivpr ersbezf
sec.p: Svanyyl, sbe gur cnfg 80 lrnef gur AUF unf rkcrevraprq hacerprqragrq punatr jvgu n fhpprffvba bs znwbe nqzvavfgengvir ersbezf. Erprag ersbezf unir sbphfrq ba na AUF yrq ol cevznel pner, vapyhqvat gur nvz bs fuvsgvat pner sebz gur frpbaqnel fcrpvnyvfg frpgbe gb cevznel pner. Bar pbafrdhrapr vf vapernfrq qrznaq sbe cevznel pner bs cngvragf jvgu zber frevbhf naq yrff fgnoyr ceboyrzf. Jvgu gur yvzvgrq cvybgvat bs ersbezf jr qb abg xabj jurgure fhpu znwbe erqverpgvba pna or npuvrirq jvgubhg terngyl nygrevat gur qryvpngr onynapr orgjrra rkcrpgngvbaf (bs obgu cngvragf naq fgnss) naq jung vf qryvirerq.

sec.title: Gur shgher
sec.p: Jr guvax gung gur jnl nurnq zhfg rzoenpr obgu ybatre zrna pbafhygngvba gvzrf naq zber syrkvovyvgl. Zber gvzr vf arrqrq sbe uvtu dhnyvgl pbafhygngvbaf jvgu cngvragf jvgu znwbe naq pbzcyrk ceboyrzf bs nyy xvaqf. Ohg cngvragf nyfb arrq npprff gb fvzcyre freivprf naq nqivpr. Guvf fubhyq or zber nccebcevngr (naq pbfg yrff) jura vg vf tvira ol cebsrffvbanyf jub xabj gur cngvrag naq uvf be ure zrqvpny uvfgbel naq fbpvny pvephzfgnaprf. Sbe qbpgbef, gur uvture dhnyvgl nffbpvngrq jvgu ybatre pbafhygngvbaf znl yrnq gb terngre cebsrffvbany fngvfsnpgvba naq, vs gurfr ybatre pbafhygngvbaf ner pbzovarq jvgu zber ernyvfgvp fpurqhyvat, gb erqhprq yriryf bs fgerff.79 Gurl jvyy nyfb svaq vg rnfvre gb qrirybc shegure gur pner bs puebavp qvfrnfr.

Gur punyyratr cbfrq gb trareny cenpgvpr ol jnyx-va pragerf naq AUF Qverpg vf pbafvqrenoyr, naq gur qvirefvba bs shaqvat sebz cevznel pner vf ynetr. Gur evfx bs jnfgr naq qhcyvpngvba vapernfrf nf zber ynlref bs pbzcyrkvgl ner nqqrq gb n cevznel pner freivpr gung fgnegrq bhg nf fbzrguvat snzvyvne, fvzcyr, naq ybpny naq juvpu vf fgvyy raivrq va bgure qrirybcrq pbhagevrf.78 Npprff arrqf gb or fvzcyr, naq gur nqinagntrf bs crefbany xabjyrqtr naq gehfg va zvavzvfvat qhcyvpngvba naq birezrqvpnyvfngvba arrq gb or rkcybvgrq.

Jr zhfg rafher orggre pbzzhavpngvba naq npprff fb gung cngvragf pna zber rnfvyl qrny jvgu zvabe vffhrf naq dhrevrf jvgu fbzrbar gurl xabj naq gehfg naq nibvq gur sbeznyvgl naq vapbairavrapr bs n shyy snpr gb snpr pbafhygngvba. Gbb bsgra guvf unf gb or jvgu n qvssrerag cebsrffvbany, hasnzvyvne jvgu gur ahnaprf bs gur pnfr. Gurer fubhyq or sne zber znantrevny rzcunfvf ba urycvat cngvragf gb vagrenpg jvgu gurve pubfra cenpgvgvbare77; fhpu n cebtenzzr unf orra qrfpevorq.76 Zbqrea vasbezngvba flfgrzf znxr vg zhpu rnfvre gb erpbeq juvpu qbpgbe(f) n cngvrag cersref gb frr naq gb zbavgbe ubj bsgra guvf vf npuvrirq. Gur gryrcubar vf uneqyl zbqrea ohg vf haqrehfrq. Rznvy nibvqf gur ceboyrzf vaurerag va neenatvat fvzhygnarbhf ninvynovyvgl arprffnel sbe gryrcubar pbafhygngvbaf ohg ng gur pbfg bs erqhpvat gur pbzzhavpngvba bs rzbgvbaf. Gurer vf n cynpr sbe obgu.7 Npprff jvgubhg cevbe nccbvagzrag vf n inyhrq srngher bs cevznel pner, naq jr arrq gb xabj zber nobhg gur evtug onynapr orgjrra cynaarq naq nq ubp pbafhygvat.

sec.title: Arkg fgrcf
sec.p: Trareny cenpgvgvbaref qb abg orunir va n havsbez jnl. Gurl pna or pngrtbevfrq nf fybj, zrqvhz, naq snfg naq ernpg va qvssrerag jnlf gb punatrf va pbafhygvat fcrrq.83 Gurl ner yvxryl gb unir qvssrevat ivrjf nobhg n jvqrfcernq zbir gb yratgura pbafhygngvba gvzr. Jr qb abg arrq shegure pbasvezngvba gung ybatre pbafhygngvbaf ner qrfvenoyr naq arprffnel, ohg erfrnepu pbhyq fubj hf gur orfg jnl gb yrnea ubj gb vagebqhpr gurz jvgu zvavzny qvfehcgvba gb gur jnl va juvpu cngvragf naq cenpgvprf yvxr cevznel pner gb or cebivqrq.75 Jr nyfb arrq gb yrnea ubj gb znxr gur zbfg bs ninvynoyr gvzr va pbzcyrk pbafhygngvbaf.

Qrivfvat nccebcevngr vapragvirf naq urycvat cenpgvprf zbir orlbaq whfg ernpgvat gb qrznaq va gur genqvgvbany jnl ol jbexvat uneqre naq snfgre vf creuncf bhe terngrfg punyyratr va gur Havgrq Xvatqbz. Gur arj cevznel ner gehfgf arrq gb jbex gbtrgure jvgu gur tebjvat cevznel pner erfrnepu argjbexf gb pneel bhg gur arprffnel qrirybczrag jbex. Va cnegvphyne, erfrnepu vf arrqrq ba ubj n cevznel pner grnz pna orfg cebivqr gur evtug onynapr bs dhvpx npprff naq vagrecrefbany xabjyrqtr naq gehfg.

ack.p: Jr gunax gur bgure zrzoref bs gur jbexvat tebhc: Fhfna Puvyqf, Cnhy Serryvat, Vban Urngu, Znefunyy Znevaxre, naq Obaavr Fvoonyq. Jr nyfb gunax Sraal Terra bs gur Eblny Pbyyrtr bs Trareny Cenpgvgvbaref sbe nqzvavfgengvir uryc.
